title: Google pixel1 battery is draining like crazy after April system upadte.
content: The last couple of weeks my Pixel battery is draining like crazy. Dropping from 30% to no charge within minutes. No apps draining the battery. There is hardly any battery usage, nothing abnormal shows up on my usage either. This started after the April system upadte. Is this an issue with the new Android update? Please help Google team.
